pages.title: Black Rhino
pages.text: Although the rhinoceros is referred to as black, its colours vary from brown to grey.$(br2)The other African rhinoceros is the white rhinoceros ($(o)Ceratotherium simum).

pages.title: Black Rhino
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:melon_slice$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
